text:
San Francisco, CA. Full time. We're http://mailgun.net (YCW11) and we're building big-data messaging back-ends.

Our brains hurt all the time, we don't serve ads, our customers love us and they pay us money every month. No eyeballs. No ads. No social.

C, Python + algos.

Send me an email, we love emails: ev@mailgun.net
